original_text: Now the sons of Rimmon the Beerothite, Rechab and Baanah, set out, and about the heat of the day they came to the house of Ish-bosheth as he was taking his noonday rest.
korean_text: 브에롯 사람 림몬의 아들 레갑과 바아나가 길을 떠나 볕이 쬘 때 즈음에 이스보셋의 집에 이르니 마침 그가 침상에서 낮잠을 자는지라

sentences.original_text: Now the sons of Rimmon the Beerothite, Rechab and Baanah
sentences.korean_translation: 림몬 브에롯 사람의 아들들, 레갑과 바아나는

sentences.original_text: And about the heat of the day
they came to the house of Ish-bosheth
as he was taking his noonday rest.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 정오 휴식을 취하고 있을 때
